name: Iliana Beziani
title: Android Developer
professional_summary: Android developer with 4 years of experience in diverse industries such as transportation, travel, and productivity. Extensive experience in complex user interface design and custom layouts following mobile design standards. Expert in designing, developing and publishing scalable and high-performance android applications both in front end and back end. Self-motivated, fast learner, proficient in programming logic and easily updatable to new technologies
technical_skills: Kotlin, Java, Open source libraries, RxJava, RxAndroid, Retrofit, Junit, Espresso, Glide, Push Notifications, Dagger2, AWS, Java annotations, Robotium, Google Analytics, Constraint Layout, Content Providers, RecyclerView Animator, IntentServices, Dagger, Firebase, Android Jetpack

past_experience.company_name: TrainPal – UK Train Tickets & Split Ticketing
past_experience.main_responsibility:
Utilised RxBinding, RxLifecycle, RxSchedulers, RxJava methods to sync real time train details and booking information to the device.
Used MVVM architecture using Data Binding Library to bind UI components in layouts to data sources in using a declarative format with one-to-many mapping between Various Views and one View Model.
Working with the integration of kotlin into the codebase
achievements: Improved stability of the app from 50 crashes a week to 1-2 crashes per week
Increased retention rate by adding notifications.

past_experience.main_responsibility:
Communicated with Google Contacts API to create new contacts, edit or delete existing contacts, and query for contacts that match particular criteria.
Architected user - stories with MVP to create presenters to load data from the model and show it on the view.
Used Espresso for instrumentation testing using Assertions, Matchers and Actions for 80% view code-coverage.
Implemented Dependency inversion principle and Open-closed Principle new user-stories for high level module not depend on low-level module.
achievements: Spearheaded the design and development of CheckApp
Held weekly brainstorming sessions that spawned numerous ideas

past_experience.main_responsibility:
Download extensive database of alcohol brands, drink details using Volley http library with Cancellation request API.
Worked with“ Tracks the units and calories in drinks” algorithms with mediator.
Worked with testers to create TDD testcase using Mockito and UI testcase using Espresso.
Coded in MVP architecture with faster XML Jackson serialization and configuration framework converted with eventBus to communicate with different presenters.
achievements: Provided guidance to executives on the future direction and bottom line benefits of mobile technology
Integrated Facebook feature for easy sign on

past_experience.company_name: ParcelTrack – Package Tracker for Fedex, UPS, USPS
past_experience.main_responsibility:
Define business rules for data manipulation and then process the user’s data with the help of Model and passing the results back to the View in MVC architecture.
Configure the send Push notification about delivery status using GCM coupled with UrbanAirship external sdk.
Stored all delivery packages in ParceTrack local database using GrenDAO database with SQLCliper encryption.
achievements: Conceived, designed and implemented Gourmettogo, which boosted sales of high margin products by 15 percent
Accelerated the company’s expansion by creating mobile application utilizing XML-RPC and JSON
